email_chain.subject: Freight Offer for Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

I hope this message finds you well. We are pleased to offer a freight rate for the shipment of 12,000MT of coal from Newcastle to Shanghai under CIF terms. Our initial freight quote is USD 42.50 per metric ton.

The vessel we propose is the MV OCEAN HORIZON, which has a DWT of 75,000 and LOA of 225m. The laycan is set for October 10 to October 15, 2023. Please let us know if this works for you or if you have any specific requirements.

Best regards,
Lucas Fernandez
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thank you for the offer. The rate seems reasonable, but we are looking for a slightly lower rate given the current market conditions. Could you review the rate and possibly offer a discount? Additionally, could you provide the demurrage rate per day?

Best,
Emily Carter
Cargo Transport

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

Thank you for your response. Considering your request, we can offer a revised rate of USD 40.00 per metric ton. The demurrage rate will be USD 12,000 per day.

Please confirm if this meets your requirements and if you need any further details on the laycan or stem.

Best regards,
Lucas Fernandez
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

The revised rate of USD 40.00 per metric ton is acceptable. However, we need to confirm the laytime start and end dates. Could you provide the exact dates?

Best,
Emily Carter
Cargo Transport

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

The laytime will start on October 10, 2023, and end on October 15, 2023. We can offer a laytime of 5 days with the demurrage rate of USD 12,000 per day thereafter.

Please confirm if these terms are acceptable.

Best regards,
Lucas Fernandez
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

We are satisfied with the terms and the laytime period. Please proceed with the necessary arrangements.

Thanks,
Emily Carter
Cargo Transport

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

Thank you for your confirmation. We will proceed with the arrangements and keep you updated on the progress.

Looking forward to a successful shipment.

Best regards,
Lucas Fernandez
Maritime Brokers
